page.title: 14Population/Employment (1981)
page.content: Figures given on page 13 were extracted from the{1981 Census}from the pages titled "Kinrosset" and "Milnaset".They show the{populations of the two places and the %of persons in each{employment}category. About 1/4 of employees living here{work {elsewhere}and{are excluded}from these figures as they are commuters.Most males work in{manufacturing}and most females in{services}in each place. Obviously many country residents are in{farming.}Both settlements are growing as{commuters}come to live here.1 in 3 Kinross inhabitants is a commuter. 29.5%of Kinross people are {aged}25-44, but the biggest group of people in Milnathort is aged 65plus(24.5%).The last five figures on page13 show that this area is one of moderate incomes.About 8%of households changed hands in the year up to Census
